definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="time">time</variable><variable type="Number" id="xp">xp</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">tooltip_event</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="itemstack_has_enchantment"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:ExperienceEnch</field><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:xp</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="item_get_enhancement"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:ExperienceEnch</field><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="3"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">ยง9+</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text_format_number"><value name="number"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:xp</field></block></value><value name="format"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">##</field></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> Experience from Mobs</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
